summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

This document appears to be a list of various explosives, heavy weapons, and miscellaneous items in the Call of Cthulhu tabletop role-playing game. The list includes different types of firearms, such as machine guns, grenade launchers, and flamethrowers, as well as explosives like pipe bombs, Molotov cocktails, and dynamite. The document also includes information on the cost, malfunction rates, and common eras in which these items were used. Additionally, some items have specific skills or uses, such as the electrical repair skill for repairing firearms. Overall, this list provides a comprehensive overview of the various explosives and heavy weapons available in the game.
